Text:
Thank you! Please tag this torrent with 'Ryan Phillippe' so that it can be found at
http://thepiratebay.org/tag/ryan+phillippe

Well it seems someone unrared this torrent and uploaded it as a new torrent here:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6150599/Little_Boy_Blue.avi

Therefore, I'll add a similar comment here to the one I made there.

I can't believe this torrent is over a year and a half old and nobody has left a comment to report the aspect ratio is wrong. It should be 4:3, not 16:9.
If you change the aspect ratio on playback, the quality is fine for a 700mb AVI.
